courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.desc: Learn HTML, CSS, JS, React, Node.js & more.
courses.more: Covers front-end and back-end development with real-world projects, Git/GitHub, APIs, and deployment practices.

courses.title: Frontend Development with React
courses.desc: Build modern UIs with React, JSX, and hooks.
courses.more: Focus on creating responsive interfaces, component-based architecture, React Router, and state management with Redux.

courses.title: Backend Development with Node.js
courses.more: Covers Express.js, RESTful APIs, authentication, and working with databases like MongoDB.

courses.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
courses.desc: Get started with web design basics.
courses.more: Learn HTML5, CSS3, Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design techniques using real projects.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.more: Focus on media queries, mobile-first design, and accessibility best practices.

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.desc: Master Python for web, data science, and AI.
courses.more: Includes Django for web development, Pandas for analysis, and frameworks like TensorFlow for machine learning.

courses.title: C Programming
courses.desc: Master the fundamentals of procedural programming.
courses.more: Topics include memory management, pointers, file handling, and structured programming techniques.

courses.title: C++ Programming
courses.more: Includes classes, inheritance, polymorphism, STL, and real-world projects.

courses.title: Java Programming
courses.more: Learn core Java concepts, OOP principles, collections, file I/O, and multithreading.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA)
courses.more: Covers arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, sorting, recursion, and graph algorithms.

courses.title: Tally & GST Accounting
courses.more: Covers TallyPrime, GST filing, invoice management, tax calculation, and payroll processing in practical sessions.

courses.title: Advanced GST Compliance
courses.desc: Master GST return filing and reconciliation.
courses.more: Learn GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, e-way bills, ITC claims, and handling GST audits with case studies.

courses.title: Income Tax Preparation
courses.desc: File ITR for individuals and businesses.
courses.more: Covers tax slabs, deductions (80C, 80D), capital gains, Form 16, and e-filing procedures for FY 2023-24.

courses.title: Auditing Practices
courses.more: Understand audit planning, documentation, sampling techniques, and reporting as per Companies Act 2013.

courses.title: Corporate Taxation
courses.more: Covers MAT, DDT, transfer pricing, FEMA compliance, and tax-saving mechanisms for companies.

courses.title: Accounting with QuickBooks
courses.more: Hands-on practice with QuickBooks Online for invoicing, expense tracking, financial reports, and payroll.

courses.title: Data Analytics with Excel & Power BI
courses.desc: Analyze and visualize data like a pro.
courses.more: Learn Excel functions, pivot tables, charts, dashboards, and Power BI for professional data storytelling.

courses.title: SQL for Data Analysis
courses.more: Learn SQL fundamentals, complex queries, joins, subqueries, and optimization techniques for PostgreSQL/MySQL.

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.desc: Leverage Python libraries for data analysis.
courses.more: Hands-on training with Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis.

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.more: Covers regression, classification, clustering, and model evaluation using Scikit-learn and real-world datasets.

courses.title: Tableau for Data Visualization
courses.more: From basic charts to advanced calculations, parameters, and storytelling with Tableau Public/Desktop.

courses.title: Big Data Analytics with Spark
courses.more: Learn PySpark for distributed computing, dataframes, and ETL pipelines on cloud platforms (AWS/GCP).

courses.title: School-Level Computer Science (CBSE/ICSE/WBCHSE)
courses.more: Covers computer applications, basic programming (Python/Java), logic building, DBMS, and exam-focused guidance.

courses.title: Mathematics for Class XI-XII (CBSE/ISC)
courses.desc: Comprehensive coverage of board exam syllabus.
courses.more: Includes calculus, algebra, trigonometry, and probability with solved examples and practice papers.

courses.title: Physics for Competitive Exams (JEE/NEET Foundation)
courses.more: Covers mechanics, thermodynamics, optics, and modern physics with problem-solving techniques.

courses.title: Chemistry Lab Practicals
courses.more: Step-by-step guidance for CBSE/ISC practical exams including titration, salt analysis, and chromatography.

courses.title: English Literature & Writing Skills
courses.more: Improves reading, writing, grammar, and analytical skills for board exams and beyond.

courses.title: Biology Diagrams and Experiments
courses.desc: Perfect your lab notebooks and diagrams.
courses.more: Detailed tutorials on drawing biological systems and performing experiments as per CBSE/ISC guidelines.
